markdownRemark.html:
Welcome

Hello there. This is a blog owned by William Park, a student of Interaction Design, taught at Belfast School of Art.

What’s this blog?

This blog is a small area of the internet for me to post my thoughts and research while creating my final project. It’s somewhat of a digital scrapbook.
